Register your domain under .com.np before its too late !

Hurry up!

Posted on February 13, 2019

If you are thinking of setting up your .com.np website just like mine, hurry up. The longer you wait, chances are someone else snatches your favorite domain name from you. Register your favorite domain name for free from here.

If you want me to do a tutorial on setting up a full functioning website, let me know in the comment section below.
